rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 2:00 PM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Bataan and Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Felipe, San Marcelino, San Narciso, Castillejos, Subic, Olongapo, San Antonio).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate with occasional heavy rains over Nueva Ecija within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Tarlac, Pampanga, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Rizal and Zambales(Candelaria, Iba, Masinloc, Palauig, Santa Cruz) which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 5:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:46 PM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Lopez, Guinayangan, Tagkawayan, Calauag, San Narciso) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
